resources.string:
🐱 Experiment Log: 

Today, I’ve been pondering the peculiarities of quantum mechanics. What if we imagine a cat, sealed in a box, where its life hinges on the decay of a radioactive atom? Without opening the box, is the cat alive or not? Perhaps, in a quantum sense, it is both—until we observe it. 

This paradox is both troubling and fascinating. It forces us to confront the role of observation in shaping reality. 

What do you think? Can observation truly define existence? 🤔
Somehow, the cat didn’t like that. 🐱😾
